alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 8:20PM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow/sleet accumulations of just a coating with an ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Mainly the high terrain along the east slopes of the Berks and the Worcester Hills. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions mainly above 1000 feet in elevation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Much of the region has changed to rain, but pockets of light freezing rain will continue to impact areas mainly over 1000 feet. Precipitation may end as a brief period of snow before things wind down early Sunday morning, but not expecting much more than an additional coating.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
